title: He Is Treating Me Like A Bad Business Deal
itunes:title: He Is Treating Me Like A Bad Business Deal
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 34 year old divorced, former model and beauty pageant winner. 5 years ago, I met and married the most perfect man. My husband is the CEO of a major company so we had an ideal lifestyle. I was young, wealthy and beautiful, with a passion for bad boys. I went to the gym daily, and a year ago, I met a man that was my age, with the best body I had seen in my life. I started sneaking around and sleeping with the guy, although my husband was devoted, loving and very attentive....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
